page.title: 06A Day in my Life
page.content: I get up by 07.00. After dressing I go down to have breakfast. Then I clean my teeth and wash. At 08.00. I feed my pony Carmon and Mum's goat Petal with pony nuts and goat mix as well as a net of hay. I go inside and get ready to leave for school at 08.45. Assembly is at 09.00.then we do Maths. or English.At 10.35. we have 15mins. Playtime. Lunch is from 12.00-13.00. then we work through to 15.15.After school on Tuesday it's Recorders. When I get home I change into jodhpurs and have a biscuit. I catch my pony to groom then ride her. Sometimes I jump in my orchard. I stop at 17.00. to feed her and the goat. I watch T.V. or do my homework till supper which is at about 18.15. I do my violin practice for half an hour. At 20.45. I go to bed.
